oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Belle Meade Plaza Christmas Lighting, 1961 November 20
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Christmas Lighting with Mayor Ben West at Belle Meade Plaza on November 20th, 1961. This festive celebration at the plaza, located on Harding Road, included music entertainment by the West High School Band and choral singers. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 7 photograph negatives : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: West, Ben, 1911-1974
Belle Meade Plaza (Nashville, Tenn.); West High School (Nashville, Tenn.)
